oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Old Fort Days Celebration Featuring LeRoy Van Dyke at Bourbon Co. Fairgrounds (18733)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Van Dyke, Leroy, 1929-; Ruwe, Grover; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing Old Fort Days Celebration featuring LeRoy Van Dyke and the Auctioneers, with Grover Ruwe and Louie and Sunshine at the Bourbon Co. Fairgrounds on June 1. Poster features metal photoplates of LeRoy Van Dyke and Grover Ruwe. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/46558/
